name: Vegan Spring Spaghetti with Asparagus and Strawberries
description: These vegan spaghetti with asparagus and strawberries are the perfect spring recipe! Light, fresh, and packed with flavor!

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the spaghetti according to the instructions on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the spaghetti according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the fennel and Remove the tough core from the fennel. Then cut it into thin stripes. Cut the asparagus into pieces (about 1.5 inches long).
recipeInstructions.name: Wash the fennel and Remove the tough core from the fennel. Then cut it into thin stripes. Cut the asparagus into pieces (about 1.5 inches long).

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat the olive oil and pan-fry the asparagus for about 5 minutes. Then add the red onion. Sauté for a minute and then add the fennel. After three minutes add the garlic and deglaze with orange juice.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat the olive oil and pan-fry the asparagus for about 5 minutes. Then add the red onion. Sauté for a minute and then add the fennel. After three minutes add the garlic and deglaze with orange juice.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the curry, the red pepper flakes and cook for about 2 minutes. Season with salt and black pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the curry, the red pepper flakes and cook for about 2 minutes. Season with salt and black pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the strawberries into quarters and add them to the vegetables. Stir in the spaghetti.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the strawberries into quarters and add them to the vegetables. Stir in the spaghetti.
